text: Burns was also a huge promoter of the Iraq war but this being disqualifying is also not a thing anymore I guess

amazing how all these state dept and DOD picks rotate through black box “consultancy” firms and no one cares and it’s never mentioned. Biden’s new DOJ No. 2 pick is also a WestExec alum, a consultancy firm that was expressly set up to be an influence pedaling govt-in-waiting

Nick Burns is Senior Counselor at the Cohen Group whose long time clients include Saudi Arabia. Remember that 10 mins when we all acted like taking Saudi money was disqualifying, I guess that phase is behind us https://t.co/o64PV4FbVm
